title: The Torch
googleplay:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey reviews the Buddy Guy documentary The Torch and After Yang as well as a new DVD box set from Rifftrax. Matthew also replays his chat with Rifftrax artist Kevin Murphy.
